title: Deluxe990
author: Deluxe990
created_time: December 06, 2022, 12:39:35 AMLast edit: December 06, 2022, 01:21:26 AM by Deluxe990
content: Please take action on moonyjope also known as Palinca89 (steamproject) Fake Guy (chuckiedorris)My Selling Thread Linkhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5178165.0Now someone like "moonyjope" which is dupe/fake account created by Palinca89 seller (in the past he was steamproject, chuckiedorris)Name: moonyjopeProfile link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3509088Posts: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3509088;sa=showPostsOther Profiles:Name: steamprojectProfile link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=493748Selling thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1005314.0hilariousandco Global moderator gave him negative feedback Alt of marius aka steamproject aka tberty aka Dorkslayz who uses an army of dozens of alts to fake vouch or spam bump his threads of hacked torrent invites. Has been banned multiple times from numerous forums for spamming but never learns.Other Name: chuckiedorrisProfile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=228434Selling thread:  Deleted by staff, because he posted in my thread, that I am scammer, later staff took notice and finally they took decision that it is dupe account of steamproject.Proof what people say about him: https://i.imgur.com/zSao2sJ.pngNew Present Name: Palinca89Profile Link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3494505New Selling thread:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5408321Now he created moonyjope new account (check joining date) to destroy the reputation of all big and famous sellers, he wrote the bad words like scamming on almost every seller (but not on Palinca89  ), because he want to destroy the repuation of all other sellers, so he can sell more. it's a matter of competetion. I have been maintaining my selling thread on Bitcointalk since from 2019 with 100% positive feedback vouches from members,moonyjope demolish my reputation without any reason, proof/evidence, so due to these bad words and statements from him, my all efforts went into the vein, to sustain and maintained my credibility on the Bitcointalk as a seller or member. I cannot remove his comment (which is posted in my thread), so please kindly take some action or issue him warning, if he has some legit proof against me, please show the proof in the front of whole community, but if there is no proof against me, why did he spoil my thread with non sense argument. I request please take some serious action or notice because in future, no one can spoil the reputation of credible and reputed member without any proof or evidence.Proof of my credibility:1. moonyjope don't buy anything from me. So How I can be scammer?2. In my selling thread I have vouches from Legendary membersZebedee23 https://i.imgur.com/3qMMwqk.pngThekool1s https://i.imgur.com/pJxEftn.pngmirtotanota (Copper Member) https://i.imgur.com/wSlg3C8.pnganoher vouch from mirtotanota  https://i.imgur.com/uTmTgoo.pngandolini82 (Hero Member) and soundsgood (Sr. Member) https://i.imgur.com/gRIt47l.pngand plenty of other feedbacks which are on my thread, I know some feedbacks are from newbies, because every buyer don't have high rank on bitcointalk.3. I challenge moonyjope, if he shows single proof/evidence of my scamming, I will delete my selling thread and stop selling.Real Face of moonyjope:1. He is writing the same word scamming on each and every seller almost.Read here: https://i.imgur.com/U4wuZSM.png2. He is not accepting my challenge of showing proof of my scammingRead here: https://i.imgur.com/YprD6OB.png3. No evidence/proofRead here: https://i.imgur.com/yAzBcvZ.png4. What other people think about that disgusting seller moonyjope (aka Palina89)https://i.imgur.com/qrvGjoF.pngProof of my report of moonyjope to Moderators:https://i.imgur.com/jzVugNP.pngMaybe staff moderators are busy, I hope they will surely take notice against that shitty guy.Writing style of moonyjope and Palinca89: (Many sellers including crednore3 was worried and thinking who is that guy)Finally I caught himCheck moonyjope: https://i.imgur.com/XAc6FPy.pngCheck Palinca89: https://i.imgur.com/itj2sYs.pngHis writing style flaw is that shit:( , )space,spaceI am not staff guy, so I can dig out more info about that shitty guy, but  i can do best from my side to reveal who is that wolf behind the stage.Bitcointalk Community: I have 1 question in my mindit's not fair, if somebody write bad comment on your thread because he is your competitor, and your all efforts are gone with that wordswhy?Please somebody take notice about that evil soul. He is against me from long time, because he got banned several times on bitcointalk due to me (because I reported him).I request to all high ranked members on bitcointalk, please take notice against him, it's not fair to write scammer anybody without any evidence/proof.

comments.body: Quote from: Deluxe990 on December 06, 2022, 12:39:35 AMI have been maintaining my selling thread on Bitcointalk since from 2019 with 100% positive feedback vouches from members,moonyjope demolish my reputation without any reason, proof/evidence, so due to these bad words and statements from him, my all efforts went into the vein, to sustain and maintained my credibility on the Bitcointalk as a seller or member.Newbie account like moonyjope with no reputation accusing you of scam without providing any evidence can hardly ruin anyone's reputation. I can understand that you are upset, but if you are a legit seller this shouldn't bother you much as so far its nothing but a piss in the wind. About his connections to the other accounts, you will have to provide more evidence for that before we (well at least I)  can take any action.Just so you know, you shouldn't expect any action taken from forum staff as they usually don't meddle into stuff like this; since scams are not moderated, same goes for scam accusations against someone. As a seller here you will just have to live with those.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Deluxe990 on December 06, 2022, 02:22:37 PMSir, I am really big upset, moonyjope is very clever person, he surely be using VPN obviously different IP from his selling thread, Anyway, like you said, as a seller I will have to live with those many moonyjopes.Thanks foryour kind words.Scammers here don't even have to use VPN as forum staff extremely rarely checks that, so that part is really irrelevant. In order to prove that two accounts are connected you have to provide a little bit more evidence, show how their posting style is the same (that is flimy evidence though), use of same social media accounts etc. I found one interesting coincidence between moonyjope and steamproject and that is that both of those accounts were active in Romanian local board. My experience here made me not to really believe in coincidence so there might be something in your claim and its the previously banned member that showed up with new alt account but I am not sure that it is enough evidence of ban evading.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: His intention is to ruin the reputation of other competitors by posting nonsense with newbie accounts. moonyjope has been accused of making false allegations against his competitors. Solid evidence is required that his accounts are connected. Because if there is no evidence, no action can be taken against him. If your service is good then such fake complaint posts by such users will not harm your reputation in any way. So ignore him and continue your service providing work. You prove by providing good service that you are real and he is fake.

I will not find you, finally I got this achievement to catch you.Don't laugh too much, you are in trouble for sure, soon.You missing the point as always put some screens here where did i scammed someone.if you are a foul ? ofcouse you are.
